name: Global Licking Pool 12 kg
description: Global Licking Pool 12 kg is mineral feed as a lick for cattle, sheep and goats and is very well absorbed. For rations with a balanced Ca:P ratio (2:1). The global licking compound provides the animals with additional minerals, vitamins and trace elements. Economical, strong, weatherproof. Without molasses = 100% minerals, does not attract flies. Product is waterproof and swiss made.
